Steps to generate less.browserified.uglified.js
===============================================

    # Clone GitHub repository of less
    $ git clone https://github.com/less/less.js.git

    # Change directory to "less" project
    $ cd less.js

    # Checkout the version from date 2017-06-08 (https://github.com/less/less.js/tree/faafd33b561a627466e18a3a2b26eb96fa993c27)
    $ git checkout faafd33b561a627466e18a3a2b26eb96fa993c27

    # Use Node 8.1.3
    $ nvm install 8.1.3

    # Install packages required by "less" project's package.json
    $ npm install

    # Globally install browserify@14.4.0
    $ npm install -g browserify@14.4.0

    # Generate less.browserified.js
    $ browserify --entry index.js --outfile less.browserified.js --standalone less

    # Globally install uglify-js
    $ npm install -g uglify-js@3.0.24

    # Uglify less.browserified.js
    $ uglifyjs less.browserified.js --compress sequences=false --beautify beautify=false,semicolons=false,comments=some --output less.browserified.uglified.js
